Introduction¶

Welcome to RetroPath2’s documentation. This project wraps the RetroPath2.0 KNIME workflow hosted on MyExperiment into a docker that may be called locally.

First build the docker using the following command:

docker build -t brsynth/rpextractsink-standalone:v2 .

To call the docker locally you can use the following command:

python run.py -sinkfile /path/to/file -sourcefile /path/to/file -rulesfile /path/to/file -rulesfile_format csv -scope_csv /path/to/output -max_steps 10

API¶

class rpTool.run_rp2¶

Call the KNIME RetroPath2.0 workflow

Parameters

  • source_path – The path to the source file

  • sink_path – The path to the sink file

  • rules_path – The path to the rules file

  • max_steps – The maximal number of steps

  • topx – The top number of reaction rules to keep at each iteraction (Default: 100)

  • dmin – The minimum diameter of the reaction rules (Default: 0)

  • dmax – The miximum diameter of the reaction rules (Default: 1000)

  • mwmax_source – The maximal molecular weight of the intermediate compound (Default: 1000)

  • mwmax_cof – The coefficient of the molecular weight of the intermediate compound (Default: 1000)

  • timeout – The timeout of the function in minutes (Default: 30)

  • partial_retro – Return partial results if the execution is interrupted for any reason (Default: False)

  • logger – Logger object (Default: None)

  • source_path – str

  • sink_path – str

  • rules_path – str

  • max_steps – int

  • topx – int

  • dmin – int

  • dmax – int

  • mwmax_source – int

  • mwmax_cof – int

  • timeout – int

  • partial_retro – bool

  • logger – logging

Return type

tuple

Returns

tuple of bytes with the results, the status message, the KNIME command used

class run.main¶

Call the docker to run KNIME RetroPath2.0 workflow

Parameters

  • sinkfile – The path to the sink file

  • sourcefile – The path to the source file

  • max_steps – The maximal number of steps

  • rulesfile – The path to the rules file

  • rulesfile_format – The file format of the rules. Valid options: tar, csv

  • scope_csv – The path to the output scope file

  • topx – The top number of reaction rules to keep at each iteraction (Default: 100)

  • dmin – The minimum diameter of the reaction rules (Default: 0)

  • dmax – The miximum diameter of the reaction rules (Default: 1000)

  • mwmax_source – The maximal molecular weight of the intermediate compound (Default: 1000)

  • mwmax_cof – The coefficient of the molecular weight of the intermediate compound (Default: 1000)

  • timeout – The timeout of the function in minutes (Default: 90)

  • partial_retro – Return partial results if the execution is interrupted for any reason (Default: False)

  • sinkfile – str

  • sourcefile – str

  • max_steps – int

  • rulesfile – str

  • rulesfile_format – str

  • scope_csv – str

  • topx – int

  • dmin – int

  • dmax – int

  • mwmax_source – int

  • mwmax_cof – int

  • timeout – int

  • partial_retro – bool

Return type

None

Returns

None
